results.content:
What? Bad pronunciation and very bad course. Author is surfing other web-hosting companies site and read to you their hosting plans (wtf?). Then he explain what domains mean, and what is difference between org and com domains (seriously?). Then we just buy reseller plan from other hosting company - and thats it - you now have your own hosting company (actually not). All course can be educated in 10 minutes. It is worst course about hosting business i've seen. NOT recommendet, dont waste your time. 

To Author - take lessons of pronunciation, and learn about business basics! Dont foolishing peoples and dont waste their time!

results.content: Way too basic and not reflected in summary. Among other things relating to the content, this course is ideal for someone who has never bought a website hosting package or searched  for hosting categories - yet it does not explain the terminology so it assumes the newbie, having never experienced hosting, will somehow understand the technical lingo. Not to be too harsh, but could someone tell the author how to pronounce 'dedicated'  - he keeps pronouncing it as 'detected'. Please say thank you for the course.
